sentence.Network_en: Sometimes a sympathizer is one step away from a lover.
sentence.Network_cn: 有时侯,同情者与情人仅一步之遥.

sentence.Network_en: It is said that his cousin, a British sympathizer under Howe's command , betrayed him.
sentence.Network_cn: 据说, 海尔之所以被发现,是因为他有一个堂兄弟在豪威的部队里做事,因为同情英国, 所以背叛了海尔.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Tong2 | Chinese Dictionary ... 同量 commensurable;commensurate 同情者 supporter;sympathizer 陈希同 Chen Xitong.

list.abs: exiting eye诱发眼sympathizing eye交感眼Vogt-Koyanagi-Harada syndrome Vogt-小柳原田综合征.
We sympathize with their national independence movement ., 我们同情他们的民族独立运动.
it's hard to sympathize with her political opinions .她的政治观点很难使人赞同。
I sympathize with him . His parents have divorced., 我同情他 . 他的父母已离婚了.

entry.def: The sympathizers of an organization or cause are the people who approve of it and support it.

means.word_mean: 1. commiserates with someone who has had misfortune
2. someone who shares your feelings and expresses sympathy or hopes that something will be successful

sentences.cn: 一个共产主义的支持者

sentences.en: When the fighting is over , we will reckon with the enemy’s sympathizers.
sentences.cn: 战争结束之后，我们就要处理通敌的人。
